Title: Relates to the establishment of a staffing plan for all uniformed and non-uniformed employees at correctional facilities
Summary: Relates to the establishment of a staffing plan for all uniformed and non-uniformed employees at correctional facilities to ensure adequate staffing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the establishment of a staffing plan for all uniformed and non-uniformed employees at correctional facilities
